PageTitle: load-balancing adaptive-routing(BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view)
FuncDef:
The load-balancing adaptive-routing command configures load balancing for adaptive routing.
The undo load-balancing adaptive-routing command restores the default configuration. The load-balancing adaptive-routing command configures load balancing for adaptive routing. The undo load-balancing adaptive-routing command restores the default configuration. By default, load balancing for adaptive routing is disabled. This command is supported only on the CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
ExtraInfo: In a direct topology, to automatically adjust forwarding paths based on network topology and traffic load changes, you can configure load-balancing adaptive-routing on a node where BGP is deployed to implement load balancing for adaptive routing.
